entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Fog spreading inland this evening. Amount 2 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016
